locations.name: Andasibe
locations.description: Gateway town for Andasibe-Mantadia National Park, renowned for its primary rainforest, Indri lemurs, and diverse nocturnal wildlife.

locations.name: Ranomafana
locations.description: Village adjacent to Ranomafana National Park, a biodiversity hotspot featuring dense cloud forest and rare species like the golden bamboo lemur.

locations.name: Ranohira
locations.description: Primary base for exploring Isalo National Park, known for its dramatic sandstone massifs, canyons, natural swimming pools, and ring-tailed lemurs.

locations.name: Ifaty
locations.description: Coastal area north of Tulear, offering beaches on the Mozambique Channel, snorkelling opportunities, and access to the unique spiny forest with baobab trees.
